title: looking for suggestions to improve my youtube channel/videos :)

embed.description: Like what you see? Why not Subscribe to see all future content? it really helps me out alot or even better follow me on twitch (link below) why not follow me on social media Follow me on Twitch! http://twitch.tv/dojobaggins Follow me on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/dojobagginsyt

body:
so like everyone has at sometime in their life im making youtube content. i would be very appreciative if you could leave me some feedback on how to improve and if it was worth watching or if its complete crap.

i know the gameplay isnt perfect. and audio could be a bit clearer.
atm ive got an issue with the program i use where all the audio is recorded on 1 clip instead of many.

but if you did like it please consider following me on twitch. (link in description of video)
